item.title: 埃尔多安会晤后，土耳其被认为支持吕特出任北约首脑
item.description: 荷兰首相周五访问伊斯坦布尔后，土耳其总统雷杰普-塔伊普-埃尔多安很可能在数周内支持马克-吕特成为下一任北约组织首脑。【原文：Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdogan is likely to throw his weight behind Mark Rutte to become the next NATO chief within weeks after the Dutch prime minister visits Istanbul Friday.】

item.title: 中国进口激增，哥伦比亚钢铁制造商帕斯德尔里奥公司押注关税上调
item.description: 随着大量中国合金涌入拉美市场，哥伦比亚钢铁制造商 Paz del Río 希望政府能尽快提高进口关税，帮助公司恢复盈利。【原文：Colombian steelmaker Paz del Río is betting authorities will raise import tariffs soon and help return the company to profitability as an influx of Chinese alloy floods Latin American markets.】

item.title: 伦敦证券交易所老板跻身英国收入最高的高管行列
item.description: 伦敦证券交易所集团（London Stock Exchange Group Plc）的首席执行官在股东投票决定将其最高薪酬提高一倍多，达到约 1300 万英镑（约合 1620 万美元）后，将加入富时 100 指数中薪酬最高的高管行列。【原文：The chief executive officer of London Stock Exchange Group Plc is set to join the FTSE 100’s highest paid executives after shareholders voted to more than double his maximum pay to about £13 million ($16.2 million).】

item.title: 必和必拓竞购英美资源将掀起矿业并购浪潮
item.description:
生产商在中国主导的超级经济周期高峰期进行收购，但却赔了夫人又折兵，导致交易停滞不前。【原文：

Deal-making stagnated after producers got burned on acquisitions they made at the height of the China-led supercycle.

】

item.title: 巴克莱引领欧洲银行展示加息后路径
item.description: 欧洲最大的投资银行进一步证明，随着利率上升带来的提振作用逐渐消失，投资者可以从资本市场出现生机的迹象这一事实中得到安慰。【原文：Europe’s biggest investment banks delivered further evidence that as the boost from rising interest rates fizzles out, investors can find solace in the fact that there’s signs of life in capital markets.】

item.title: Blackstone 与 KKR 达成 16 亿美元学生公寓交易
item.description: Blackstone Inc. 同意以 16.4 亿美元的价格将一个学生住房投资组合出售给 KKR & Co.【原文：Blackstone Inc. agreed to sell a student-housing portfolio to KKR & Co. for $1.64 billion.】

item.title: 英美资源集团股价显示交易商希望更有利的出价
item.description: 交易商正推动英美资源集团（Anglo American Plc）的股价高于必和必拓集团（BHP Group Ltd. ）的收购提案价值，这表明他们预计收购方或其他插足者将出价更高。【原文：Traders are pushing Anglo American Plc shares above the value of BHP Group Ltd.’s takeover proposal, a sign they expect a higher bid from the suitor or an interloper.】

item.title: 地产大亨维特克正在削减 200 亿欧元的帝国债务
item.description: 捷克房地产亿万富翁拉多万-维特克（Radovan Vitek）将其资产出售目标提高了一倍，以求在疯狂购买使其成为欧洲最大房东之一之后抑制债务。【原文：Czech real estate billionaire Radovan Vitek is doubling his asset-sale target, in a bid to curb debt after a buying spree that made him one of Europe’s largest landlords.】

item.title: 乌克兰在获得美国重要援助后再次降息
item.description: 乌克兰中央银行降低借贷成本的幅度超过预期，因为通胀继续放缓，基辅当局欢呼获得数十亿美元的外国援助，以帮助应对俄罗斯的入侵。【原文：Ukraine’s central bank lowered borrowing costs more than expected as inflation continued to slow and the authorities in Kyiv hailed billions of dollars in foreign aid to help counter Russia’s invasion.】

item.title: 土耳其在通胀峰值接近 70% 前暂停加息
item.description: 土耳其央行维持利率不变，在大幅加息令市场大吃一惊一个月后暂停了加息，并在此后采取了进一步的紧缩措施。【原文：Turkey’s central bank kept interest rates unchanged, pausing a month after surprising markets with a big hike and delivering additional tightening since then.】

item.title: 津巴布韦黄金支持的 ZiG 自上市以来首次走弱
item.description: 津巴布韦的黄金支持货币 ZiG 自本月初上市以来首次走软。【原文：Zimbabwe’s gold-backed currency the ZiG weakened for the first time since its debut earlier this month.】

item.title: 马克龙称通胀不能成为货币政策的唯一目标
item.description: 2024 年 4 月 18 日星期四，比利时布鲁塞尔，法国总统埃马纽埃尔-马克龙在欧洲理事会特别峰会后的新闻发布会上。欧盟相对于主要地缘政治对手的影响力正在减弱，这在欧洲各国首都敲响了警钟，迫使各国领导人讨论彻底转型，以增强欧盟在充满敌意的世界中的竞争力。摄影师Simon Wohlfahrt/Bloomberg【原文：Emmanuel Macron, France's president, during a news conference following a Special European Council summit in Brussels, Belgium, on Thursday, April 18, 2024. The European Union’s waning clout versus major geopolitical rivals is sounding alarm bells in Europe’s capitals, compelling leaders to discuss a radical transformation to boost the bloc’s competitiveness in a hostile world. Photographer: Simon Wohlfahrt/Bloomberg】

item.title: 卢特尼克为其与 CME 的期货大战牵线华尔街巨头
item.description: 霍华德-卢特尼克（Howard Lutnick）正在召集华尔街的一些大腕，准备向期货交易和利率衍生品巨头芝加哥商品交易所集团（CME Group Inc.【原文：Howard Lutnick is lining up some of Wall Street’s biggest power players for a fresh challenge to the behemoth of futures trading and interest-rate derivatives, CME Group Inc.】

item.description:
在本周的Merryn Talks Money节目中，BlondeMoney 首席执行官海伦-托马斯（Helen Thomas）解释了她对新首相和夏季大选的预测。【原文：

On this week’s Merryn Talks Money, BlondeMoney CEO Helen Thomas explains her predictions for a new prime minister and a surprise summer election.

item.title: CVC 将交易规模扩大至 23 亿欧元，可能在中期定价上市
item.description: CVC Capital Partners 将其首次公开募股的规模扩大了 5 亿欧元（5.36 亿美元），并可能将在阿姆斯特丹的股票销售定价定在最初提议范围的中间位置，这表明投资者对这一期待已久的上市的需求非常强烈。【原文：CVC Capital Partners increased the size of its initial public offering by €500 million ($536 million), and is likely to price the share sale in Amsterdam at the middle of an initially proposed range, indicating the depth of investor demand for the long-awaited listing.】

item.title: 预计降息次数减少，第一公民上调 NII 预测值
item.description: 第一公民银行股份有限公司（First Citizens BancShares Inc.【原文：First Citizens BancShares Inc., which scooped up Silicon Valley Bank after the lender failed last year, lifted its guidance for lending income for 2024.】

item.title: 对冲基金创始人声称有争议的税务交易 "完全合法
item.description: 对冲基金创始人桑杰-沙赫（Sanjay Shah）被指控策划了一起从丹麦政府抢走 14 亿英镑（17 亿美元）的外汇交易计划，他声称自己认为这些交易 "完全合法"。【原文：Sanjay Shah, the hedge fund founder accused of masterminding a Cum-Ex trading scheme that robbed £1.4 billion ($1.7 billion) from the Danish government, claimed he thought the transactions were “completely legal.”】

item.title: 关注天气变化，小麦几乎抹平年初至今的损失
item.description: 在芝加哥交易的小麦期货几乎抹去了今年迄今为止的跌幅，此前因担心主要生产国的天气而连续六天反弹。【原文：Wheat futures traded in Chicago nearly erased losses so far this year, after a six-day rally on concerns over weather in key producers.】

item.title: 卡特彼勒利润超出预期，定价抵消了销售下滑的影响
item.description: 卡特彼勒公司（Caterpillar Inc.【原文：Caterpillar Inc. reported first-quarter earnings that beat Wall Street’s expectations, helped by stronger pricing even as sales volumes slipped slightly.】

item.title: 研究显示：印度人挥霍无度，家庭债务创历史新高
item.description: 印度的家庭债务在去年最后三个月可能飙升至创纪录水平，有迹象表明消费者正在增加风险较高的借贷，这一直是央行担心的问题。【原文：India’s household debt likely surged to a record in the final three months of last year, with signs that consumers are boosting riskier borrowing that’s been a worry for the central bank.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: 早上好。科技股在 Meta 令人失望后挣扎，财报季继续快速进行，交易员们在等待美国 GDP 数据。以下是市场动态。【原文：Good morning. Tech stocks struggle after Meta disappointment, earnings season continues apace and traders wait for US GDP data. Here’s what’s moving markets. — David Goodman】

item.title: 香奈儿首席执行官称通胀和工艺推动了价格上涨
item.description: 香奈儿首席执行官为该奢侈品牌的定价进行了辩护，因为该品牌将其最著名的一款手袋的价格提高到了 10,000 多欧元（10,725 美元）。【原文：Chanel’s chief executive officer defended the luxury brand’s pricing after it raised the cost of one of its best-known handbags to more than €10,000 ($10,725).】

item.title: 联合利华击败令人失望的雀巢，实现命运逆转
item.description: 联合利华公司（Unilever Plc）在第一季度扭转了雀巢公司（Nestle SA）的颓势，这家英国消费品公司在多年落后之后，业绩超过了瑞士竞争对手。【原文：Unilever Plc turned the tables on Nestle SA in the first quarter, as the UK consumer goods company outperformed its Swiss rival after years of lagging behind.】

item.title: 德国艾德勒房地产公司与债券持有人达成协议
item.description: 陷入困境的德国房地产公司阿德勒集团（Adler Group SA）周四上午发表声明称，该公司已与债券持有人达成一项不具约束力的协议。【原文：Troubled German real estate firm Adler Group SA has reached a non-binding agreement with bondholders, according to a company statement released on Thursday morning.】

item.title: 大陆集团因参与柴油机排放骗局被罚 1 亿欧元
item.description: 大陆集团（Continental AG）因未能阻止其员工参与柴油机排放欺诈被罚款 1 亿欧元（1.07 亿美元），这家汽车供应商正在解决一系列管理问题。【原文：Continental AG was fined €100 million ($107 million) for failing to prevent that its staff participated in the diesel emissions fraud as the auto supplier works through a range of governance issues.】

item.title: Meta 因使用性取向数据遭欧盟警告
item.description: 欧盟最高法院的一名顾问警告说，根据欧盟数据保护规则手册，Meta Platforms Inc.【原文：Meta Platforms Inc.’s Facebook should be blocked from exploiting public information on a users’ sexual orientation for targeted advertising under the European Union’s data protection rulebook, an adviser to the bloc’s top court warned.】

item.title: 赞比亚通胀率创 26 个月新高，货币路线卷土重来
item.description: 赞比亚的年通货膨胀率攀升至 26 个月来的新高，而且可能会继续上升，因为该国部分地区出现了创纪录的干旱，而且货币再次疲软，抬高了物价。【原文：Zambia’s annual inflation rate climbed to a 26-month high and may continue to increase as a record drought in parts of the country and renewed weakness in the currency lifts prices.】

item.title: 风电公司 OX2 首次出现季度亏损，创上市以来最大跌幅
item.description: 瑞典风电公司 OX2 AB 公布了有史以来的首次季度亏损，其股价创下自三年前上市以来的最大跌幅。【原文：Shares in OX2 AB fell the most since listing three years ago after the Swedish wind firm reported its first ever quarterly loss.】

item.title: 价格下跌钻井产量增加，中国石油利润上升
item.description: 由于中国最大的海上钻井公司在全球原油价格略微下跌的情况下继续增加产量，中国石油天然气股份有限公司第一季度利润创下历史新高。【原文：Cnooc Ltd. saw profits hit a record in the first quarter as China’s biggest offshore driller continued to increase output amid slightly lower global crude prices.】

item.title: 为躲避英国罚款，H2O 将向愤怒的客户提供数百万奖金
item.description: H2O 资产管理公司（H2O Asset Management）正试图通过向愤怒的客户提供补偿来避免英国的罚款，这些客户自 2020 年以来一直无法获得当时价值约 16 亿欧元（17 亿美元）的投资。【原文：H2O Asset Management is seeking to avoid a UK fine by offering payoffs to irate clients who have been prevented since 2020 from accessing investments that were then worth about €1.6 billion ($1.7 billion).】
